name: Attack of the Killer Monsters
description:
Some labs specialize on growing sentient, oversize vegetables. Other labs try to revive dangerous, extinct predators. They all failed with disastrous results. But true science cannot be stopped. True scientists will try and try again until at last we succeed.

Join us on a journey of destructive self-discovery with our monstrous friends.

Attack of the Killer Monsters explores the traumatic childhood of 4 animals raised in a remote island laboratory. This game will draw you in with an evocative story, emotional connection ... Ahh, who are we kidding: Its all about destroying stuff and stomping on your enemies. Monsters are monsters, and they have a bad day. They really need to let off some steam.
